General.Name: Kinh Bac City Development Share Holding Corp
General.Description: KinhBac City Development Holding Corporation invests, constructs, and trades in real estate properties in Vietnam. The company develops industrial parks, urban areas, hotels, and commercial centers, as well as finance, banking, mineral exploitation, energy, and education facilities. It also leases land with infrastructure; and buys and leases factory and office facilities, business industrial parks, and urban areas. The company was formerly known as Kinh Bac City Development Share Holding Corporation. KinhBac City Development Holding Corporation was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Que Vo, Vietnam.
